base_description: Rectangular, gray cabinet with modern design.
part_description: Contains four upper compartments and one large lower panel. The compartments are evenly spaced and rectangular, while the lower panel covers the bottom half of the cabinet.
internal_interaction_description: The upper compartments provide storage space and are separated by vertical dividers. The large lower panel may function as a door or cover, possibly hinged or sliding, to access the interior storage area behind it.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall, used for storage in homes or offices. Its design allows for interaction with users who can open or close the lower panel to access stored items, and place or retrieve items from the upper compartments.
